entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] ArrayTests timing out on helix #62661
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix support for using `ActiveIssue`, and other related attributes #62660
  • CustomAttributeData.ConstructorArguments throws when retrieving a typeof() argument from an in-memory compilation #62659
  • Developers have access to better Compression APIs #62658
    Future
  • Consider removing goto statements on Regex source-generated code #62657
    7.0.0
  • Enumerable.MinBy and Enumerable.MaxBy may or may not throw on empty collections depending on the collection type #62656
  • Can't resolve symbols for mscorlib.ni.dll, could you please advice #62654
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #62653
  • Clean up some RegexNode code #62651
    7.0.0
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #62650
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: split Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility into 2 parts (NoGdi and Gdi) #62649
  • Improve single-range IgnoreCase codegen for RegexCompiler / source generator #62647
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `in` parameter modifier is present #62644
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(string) #62628
  • How do I get the distribution of application memory in Windbg #62626
    7.0.0
  • Resolve inconsistency between \w and \b determination for what is a word character #62619
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][hotreload] Cannot build `ApplyUpdateReferencedAssembly` with source link #62618
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.LogWritten #62616
  • Consider rebuilding loop table after loop cloning #62615
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Runtime-dev-innerloop linux x64 debug all configurations failed with locked file #62471
    7.0.0
  • Add a capability to C#/CLR runtime to report which variable caused Null pointer exception, similar to Java 14 "Helpful NullPointerException". https://openjdk.java.net/jeps/358 #62596
  • Regex source generator could produce better negated conditions in some cases #62622
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager is not thread-safe #50480
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator causes errors and warnings for messages using formatting specifiers #62572
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator results in a compile error with a List<> of enums with a JsonConverter #61860
    6.0.x
  • JSON source generator fails to compile with CS1061 if enum property decorated with [JsonConverter] #62079
    6.0.x
  • Fatal error. 0x80131506 when use `System.Management` in PublishTrimmed mode #57406
    Future
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) inside GC.Collect #62637
  • Misleading error message for invalid regex pattern #62631
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not enforce request Content-Length correctness #62258
    7.0.0
  • New rule suggestion: require overriding Equals(Object) and GetHashCode() when implementing IEquatable #52958
    Future
  • dotnet publish with net6 can't resolve runtime #62609
  • Length of Filestream opening /proc/meminfo is zero #62629
  • Crash caused by corrupted stack in System.Net.Quic tests #62613
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #62468

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not perform vector save/restore around call that will never return #62662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Attempt to repro named mutex pal test issue #62655
    * NO MERGE *, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [Draft] Make mono runtime tests stop using patching in CI; remove dependency on coreclr #62652
  • Do not promote struct locals with holes #62645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added missed penultimate bytes in `SniHelper_TruncatedData_Fails` scenario #62641
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Replace CorInfoIntrinsics with NamedIntrinsic #62639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62638
    area-System.IO
  • Update spmi asp.net script to collect some osr method contexts #62635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup, use camel case name conventions of method parameters #62633
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero extend after ldr/ldrh/ldrb #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Divide properties into: public, private, protected. #62627
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix issues in PAL #62625
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix for issue#58421 #62624
    area-Serialization
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #62614
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cleanup name of CreateThread shim #62648
  • Make tests pass on AVX only host again #62544
    community-contribution
  • Fix double-negatives with MatchCharacterClass #62636
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix describing concatenations in alternations #62646
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix lazy-initialization of Trace.s_correlationManager to be thread-safe #62640
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add IsPackable to RateLimiting package and cleanup packaging TODOs #62612
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add \w helper function to RegexCompiler / source generator #62620
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62595
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Decrease the startup ceremony #62587
  • Enforce HTTP request Content-Length correctness #62541
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add instructions to skip restoring nuget packages #62634
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Allow the main.js file to keep it's name #62576
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Mark forward delegate stubs as not having hidden arguments #62617
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add System.Native APIs needed by NativeAOT #62571
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Relegate PatternsDataSet_ConstructRegexForAll_SourceGenerated test to 64-bit only #62621
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • A little more regex source generator tweaking #62605
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Populate NativeAOT sources from runtimelab #62611

Updated

  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch over Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests to use merged wrappers #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62601
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Unify the namespaces of HashProviderDispenser #62590
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Introduce automation rules for PR workflows #62534
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure
  • Skip native composite ReadyToRun images as inputs to Crossgen2 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Clear list of OOB packages built on 6.0 #62610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62037
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix __SkipRestorePackages setup for msbuild during tests build #62583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generalize loop pre-header creation and loop hoisting #62560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix RazorPredefinedProviderNameTests #58263
  • Warning on var-declared variables that are never null assigned #58262
  • Use a consistent test running strategy across environments #58261
  • Warn if conversion depends on the order in which interfaces are specified in class base #58258
  • RFE: Move type to namespace, merge same NS sections #58257
  • Report error for built-in operations and conversions for nint and nuint in Expression trees #58256
  • Remove all MEF exports of internal Roslyn types from TypeScript #58255
  • C# Editor - Paste comment line always converts line endings to CRLF #58251
  • Refactor to an interpolated string when an overload that takes an InterpolationHandler is present #58249
  • Switch optimizations aren't applied to pattern matching #58246
  • ICodeGenerationService.CreateMethodDeclaration should not return null #58243

Closed

  • Move WPF tests to Xunit.StaFact #58237
  • Incorrect nullable flow analysis in recursive local function calls #45934
    Compiler.Next
  • ExpressionEvaluator.*.UnitTests are not run in CI #58030
    17.1
  • It looks like NullableWalker is not going to properly handle an initializer for BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #56863
    Backlog
  • Nullable does not correctly look at object/collection initializers of NoPIA object creation #45082
    Backlog
  • ECUI supports naming styles #58084
    Backlog
  • Incremental source generator hint name issue #57991
  • Possible NRE in AbstractConvertPlaceholderToInterpolatedStringRefactoringProvider.GetExpandedArguments #58234

PullRequests

Created

  • Include any class with methods with attributes in RunTests #58259
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix stack exhaustion when parsing large regex alternating sequences. #58254
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "OmniSharp options" #58253
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add VSTypeScriptBlockStructure external access APIs #58252
    Area-IDE
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Give some support for generated documents in CodeModel #58241
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1505882 #58239
  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Find unit test assemblies whose names differ from the project directory name #58194
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • NullableWalker - properly handle BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #58227
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Avoid loading analyzers during unload #58240
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Remove usage of weak-value-source for smart-open-scope references #58212
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58245
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58232
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58163
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Fix metadata references declaration #58059
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #53386
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.1
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine WebHostTests.UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #38954
  • Quarantine ShutdownTests #38951
    Test failures
  • Perf regression: json #38949
  • Each nativefilereference causes 512+mb to be allocated #38948
  • `browser-refresh.js` not found at `localhost` when using remote debugging #38946
  • NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #38945
  • SignalR: Handling Redis lost connection. #38944
  • [.Net 5 MVC with Blazor] Creating new razor components not working #38950
  • Unable to create asp.net core api with dotnet cli #38942
  • [.NET 6 Blazor server] 'Exceeded the maximum byte array transfer limit for a call' when transfer byte array from js to c# #38941
  • Blazor WASM does not load on iOS 10.3.4. #38938
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #38935
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyTests.ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #38931
    Test failures
  • Create a 5.0 MVC Individual project, update framework and all packages version to 6.0.0 and run the project. After click “Register”, the input box appears above the text. #38930
  • Problems with using WebSocket in Edge #38929

Closed

  • Better Support for multiple forms on the same Razor Page #38920
  • asp.net .net 6: Unauthorized access returns 403 instead of 401 #38718
  • dotnet new webApp failed,can't load assemblies error #37757
  • ForwardedHeaders and incorect RemoteIpAddress #38940
  • Templates with <Nullable>enable</Nullable> are very irritating to get started with #37099
    Discussions
  • Fix upgrade behavior for asp.net runtime in hosting bundle #36382
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS.Redist packages contain different .msi Package Codes than Bundles #38629
  • Blazor cannot execute OnChange Event #38916
  • Model validation errors only include the C# property path, rather than the original input path #38925
  • Infinite loop on click in Blazor #38936
  • Adding new MediaType to NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter doesn't work #38911
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add possibility to customize `Server` response header in `KestrelServerOptions` #38895
  • Support binding to IFormFile in minimal routing APIs #34303
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Turn off parallelization for ShadowCopy tests #38956
    area-runtime
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor
  • Revert .NET SDK test bump, again #38937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38927
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Quarantine UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #38955
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ShutdownTests #38952
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #38932
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Rename SetScript variants #38928
    7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor
  • Prevent SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38901
    area-signalr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump collect do not create any dumps (dotnet 6 on OSX Apple Chip) #2779
    .NET 6.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug][iOS] SemanticScreenReader.Announce not working on iOS #3736
  • ShowVideo Property for MediaElement #3733
  • [Bug] [iOS] Reads "empty list" after last button #3731
  • [Bug] HotReload not working for inner view #3727
  • DisplayActionSheet not opening the action dialog on Windows #3726
  • Maui App template - Windows - "The project doesn't know how to run the profile Windows Machine" #3725
  • Essentials GetMainDisplayInfo uses unsupported API (and throws exception) #3722

Closed

  • [Bug] [iOS] Recipe gets read aloud twice #3732
  • ImageSource.FromStream causes crash on Android #3730
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView crashes and goes black #2211

PullRequests

Created

  • Essentials fix DeviceDisplay and DeviceInfo #3738
  • Window flyout handler #3735
  • Hide maui templates in VS 17.0 and lower #3734
    area/templates 📄
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Updated SearchBarHandler native events #3728
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Added support for hosted services #2244 #3724
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Register compatibilty handlers for RelativeLayout and AbsoluteLayout #3723
    area/layout 🔲
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3721
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲
  • Return a blank Label when LoadTemplate is null to prevent Hot Reload crashes #3692
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android, iOS] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled property in SearchBar #3713
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • db.EnsureCreated() doesn't seem to create views #26965
  • 'variable '__p_1' of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[FileModel]' referenced from scope '', but it is not defined' #26964
  • context.Database.GetAppliedMigrations(); returns all database applied migrations but not per context #26962
  • Referencing Base Type and Sub Type in same entity results in Ambiguous FK exception #26961
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Add-Migration - Period property 'Comment.PeriodStart' must be a shadow property #26960

Closed

  • Segmentation Fault On CentOS 7.9.2009 #26913
  • Generated query has extra non-existent column with suffix 1 #26924
  • startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex') #26852
  • Cosmos Where query on owned properties throws a translation exception #26849
  • How to update an entity with collection property that has either new, updated or deleted entities? #26830
  • SaveChangesAsync doesn't preserve the sync context across retries #26763

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.2] Add the ability to break self-ref cycles between added and removed entities #26963
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.2] Restore the ability to break multiple FK cycles #26959
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.2] Handle duplicate property infos when sorting columns. #26958
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Preserve synchronization context in ExecutionStrategy #26953

Updated

  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IncludedWorkloadManifests.txt file is empty in 6.0.101 SDK installation #12789

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #12796
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #12795
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #12794
  • Fix the logic that generates the fallback text file #12790
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
